description.value:
Frequency once per hour

You wash away a creature's pain with a touch. An adjacent creature regains @Damage[100[healing]] Hit Points and reduces their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened], and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied] conditions by 1 (to a minimum of 0).
